channel.title: Heavy Demands - Development Team!
channel.description:
Ok, don't need any forum mods or ingame mods, thanks, but no thanks. :|
Ok first of all, i just need some people. that can help me with some things.
EXAMPLE:
I Actually need to know this.
NPC Dialogue. But make it so You can choose. 'Yes i'll pay 10m' or 'No, Sorry.'
Need a 'NPC Designer'
Basically someone that can 'color' client side NPCs.
also i need a suggestion.
Who is a 'Female' character that's good to be your 'Mum' in the game.
Just wondering cause im making a 'story' to this RSPS

item.title: Heavy Demands - Development Team!
item.dc:creator: @Souls2 Souls`
item.description:
@Souls2 wrote:

mpsmpsmps:

dude thats one of the easiest parts of whole coding? how the heck you gained your rep?

If it is why don’t you show us?
